translation:
It's finally here! Starting today, when you switch to Busy mode your riders will see a promotion offering them 35% off all Juno rides. You will receive $15 for each rider that signs up with you when they take their first Juno ride. Let's start spreading the Juno story!

You can disable this promotion in Settings.
Join our Beta program to enjoy 35% off all rides

!!!We will shortly send a text message to the number submitted with a link to download the app

THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!
